thread.title: 'Hail Caesar' Trailer Shows George Clooney Getting Kidnapped
thread.title_full: 'Hail Caesar' Trailer Shows George Clooney Getting Kidnapped

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Hail Caesar' Trailer Shows George Clooney Getting Kidnapped
text:
Comments The disappearance of an A-list actor puts the biggest movie release of the year in jeopardy. 
The first trailer for " Hail Caesar " has arrived for viewing pleasure. It gives an official first look at the characters played by Josh Brolin , George Clooney , Scarlett Johansson , Channing Tatum , Jonah Hill , Tilda Swinton , Frances McDormand , and Ralph Fiennes . The movie centers on Eddie Mannix, a Hollywood fixer tasked with keeping the scandals of the town's biggest stars from leaking out. Among the problems he is dealing with as teased in the trailer is the kidnapping of an A-list actor by a group called The Future. Written and directed by Ethan and Joel Coen, "Hail Caesar" is an all-star comedy set during the latter years of Hollywood's Golden Age. It is scheduled to make its way out in the United States on February 5, 2016.
